page.title: 06SCHOOLS
page.content: The Infant and Junior Schools are on separate sites, and both have experienced falling roles. There is a proposal to close the Infants building and amalgamate the 2 schools at the Junior School site. The Infants School was purpose-built and opened in 1969. It is open-plan andd spacious inside. There is an outdoor stage, concrete play equipment,and different environments for wildlife. When the school opened, there were 225 pupils. Now there are 95. Construction of new classrooms at the Junior School site has already begun. The proposal to close a 16-year old school has, of course, caused great controversy in the village. Despite a recent political change on the County Council, it looks likely to go ahead.
